1.0.name: wordpress/garees-twitter-stream
1.0.description:
Garee's Twitter Stream is a highly customizable Wordpress-plugin that shows either tweets of a twitter user, his favorites, one of his lists or the results of a twitter-search. The output is generated from template-files or your own templates, which you can write with Mustache.

For more information check out the official plugin-site

Main-advantages:

  • No javascript/ajax - only server-side scripting
  • Tweet-requests are cached
  • CSS only included if shortcode found on page
  • highly customizable with Mustache-templates

Just insert the shortcode anywhere on your blog: [twitter_stream user='your_twitter_account']

Use shortcode-options to further customize which tweets and how they should be displayed. Check out the examples on the live-demo
